  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet.all(int)
    no longer needed since Query and Filter were merged
    org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSet.bits()
    this method is redundant and will be removed.
    org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher.search(Query, Collector)
    This method is being deprecated in favor of IndexSearcher.search(Query, CollectorManager) due to its support for concurrency in IndexSearcher
    org.apache.lucene.search.SortField.getOptimizeSortWithIndexedData()
    org.apache.lucene.search.SortField.getOptimizeSortWithPoints()
    This is a duplicate method for SortField#getOptimizeSortWithIndexedData.
    org.apache.lucene.search.SortField.setOptimizeSortWithIndexedData(boolean)
    should only be used for compatibility with 8.x indices that got created with inconsistent data across fields, or the wrong sort configuration in the index sort
    org.apache.lucene.search.SortField.setOptimizeSortWithPoints(boolean)
    should only be used for compatibility with 8.x indices that got created with inconsistent data across fields, or the wrong sort configuration in the index sort. This is a duplicate method for SortField#setOptimizeSortWithIndexedData.
    org.apache.lucene.util.automaton.Operations.concatenate(Automaton, Automaton)
    use Operations.concatenate(List) instead
    org.apache.lucene.util.automaton.Operations.union(Automaton, Automaton)
    use Operations.union(Collection) instead
    org.apache.lucene.util.BitDocIdSet.bits()
    org.apache.lucene.util.CharsRef.getUTF16SortedAsUTF8Comparator()
    This comparator is only a transition mechanism
    org.apache.lucene.util.NotDocIdSet.bits()
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.TopFieldCollectorManager(Sort, int, FieldDoc, int, boolean)
    Use TopFieldCollectorManager(Sort, int, FieldDoc, int), the supportsConcurrency parameter is now a no-op.
    org.apache.lucene.search.TopScoreDocCollectorManager(int, ScoreDoc, int, boolean)
    Use TopScoreDocCollectorManager(int, ScoreDoc, int), the supportsConcurrency parameter is now a no-op.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    org.apache.lucene.util.automaton.RegExp.Kind.REGEXP_DEPRECATED_COMPLEMENT
    Will be removed in Lucene 11
    org.apache.lucene.util.packed.PackedInts.Format.PACKED_SINGLE_BLOCK
    Use PackedInts.Format.PACKED instead.
